title: LF Peeps for team! :D (jungle and support)
body:
We are looking for RELIABLE AND ACTIVE players for our team. We have made one before but the leader was.....Not reliable.......Let's say.......We are mainly looking for silver+ players that are flexible. We're very serious about practice and attitude when we play. The ultimate goal is for us to all improve as a team and as individual players. You're welcome to join if you want to improve with us and have some fun

Message me or qwertyuiopman in game or post on here (but prefer in game) MUST HAVE SKYPE!

replies.body: Main jungle here, this is my smurf account, main is xBlazed. i main jungle, Vi, Elise, Amu, Sej, Kha, WW, Rek'Sai. add me in game play almost every night 4pm-11pm (generally) qld time
